ol.SubTitle: Ingredient Checklist
ol.li: 1 (16 ounce) package confectioners' sugar, plus more for dusting

Instructions.SubTitle: DirectionsInstructions Checklist

ol.Step: Step 1 Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Step 2 Mix cake mix and 2 eggs together in a bowl. Add butter and vanilla extract; mix until batter is smooth and thick. Spread batter into the prepared baking dish.
Step 3 Beat confectioners' sugar, cream cheese, and 2 eggs together in a bowl until smooth; spread over batter.
Step 4 Bake in the preheated oven until sides of cake are pulled away from dish and browned, 25 to 35 minutes. Cool cake completely. Sprinkle more confectioners' sugar over cooled cake.
